itineraryDays.title: Day 1

activities.name: Amber Fort
activities.description: Explore the magnificent Amber Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Enjoy an elephant ride (optional, early morning to avoid heat) up to the fort or a jeep ride. (2-3 hours)

activities.name: Panna Meena ka Kund
activities.description: Visit the beautiful stepwell, a great place to take photographs and soak in the rich heritage.

activities.name: City Palace
activities.description: Visit the City Palace, the residence of the Maharaja of Jaipur. Explore the museum and courtyards. (2-3 hours)

activities.name: Hawa Mahal
activities.description: See the iconic Hawa Mahal (Palace of Winds) from the outside. Take photos and enjoy the view. Consider visiting the museum inside. (1 hour)

activities.name: Dinner at 1135 AD (Amber Fort)
activities.description: Enjoy a romantic dinner at 1135 AD inside Amber Fort for a royal dining experience.

itineraryDays.tips: Stay hydrated and carry water. Wear comfortable walking shoes.

itineraryDays.title: Day 2

activities.name: Jantar Mantar
activities.description: Visit Jantar Mantar, an astronomical observatory and a UNESCO World Heritage Site. (1-2 hours)

activities.name: Albert Hall Museum
activities.description: Explore the Albert Hall Museum, the oldest museum in Rajasthan. (2-3 hours)

activities.name: Shopping at Bapu Bazaar/Johari Bazaar
activities.description: Shop for souvenirs, textiles, jewelry, and handicrafts at Bapu Bazaar or Johari Bazaar. (2-3 hours)

activities.name: Romantic Spa Treatment
activities.description: Enjoy a couples spa treatment at a luxury hotel or spa for relaxation.

activities.name: Dinner at Spice Court
activities.description: Have dinner at Spice Court, known for its authentic Rajasthani cuisine.

itineraryDays.tips: Stay hydrated and carry water. Wear comfortable walking shoes.
